chart_description: This chart shows the number of heap bytes that have been released back to the operating system by the AWS Load Balancer Controller. It is a measure of the amount of memory that is being freed up by the program and returned to the system for other applications to use.

dimension_descriptions.go_memstats_heap_released_bytes: The total number of bytes of heap memory that have been released back to the operating system. This is a cumulative value and will increase over time as more memory is freed up.
